title: Banana Split
info: The Banana Split is a food item dropped by Antlions, Antlion Chargers, Antlion Swarmers, Giant Antlion Chargers, and Giant Antlion Swarmers with a 2% chance. When consumed, it grants the Plenty Satisfied buff. This lasts for 10 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon () or by double-tapping the buff icon ().
stat:
Type
Food
Use time17 (Very fast)
